Aizawl.title: Aizawl
Aizawl.byline: Aizawl is the capital and largest city of the state of Mizoram, India.

Aizuwakamatsu.title: Aizuwakamatsu
Aizuwakamatsu.byline: Aizuwakamatsu (会津若松) is the main city in the Aizu region of Fukushima Prefecture, in the north of Honshū island, the largest of Japan.
